name: Code.org Dark Theme
description:
A simple dark theme for code.org, loosely based on solarized dark

Use Stylus, not Stylish for installing these themes: https://add0n.com/stylus.html


Todo:
I'm open for suggestions!
additional_info:
0.9.4 - 1/29/2019 - Added support for app lab design mode, and fixed miscellaneous text
0.9.3 - 12/7/2018 - Fixed some list items not being readable
0.9.2 - 11/13/2018 - Fixed multiple choice page and 'find a course' box
0.9.1 - 10/30/2018 - Changed colors to match solarized dark, fixed a couple things like the turtle page
0.9.0 - 9/14/2018 - Initial release
